remotebit.isConnected: Returns true if the remote:bit is connected.
remotebit.onReceivedBuffer: On remote:bit received buffer from a component.
remotebit.onReceivedValues: On remote:bit received values from a component.
remotebit.sendBufferFromArray: Sends buffer(from an array) to remote:bit component.
remotebit.sendValues: Sends value(s) to remote:bit component. Each value occupies 2 bytes, which is 0 to 65535.
remotebit.setTransmitPower: Sets the bluetooth transmit power between 0 (minimal) and 7 (maximum).
